ygData.subject: Tongues and Dwarves
ygData.msgSnippet: Ah yes! I meant Kaladim. The island of Faydwer is still a mystery to me, and the names confuse me quite often. Kaladim, Kelethin, Felwithe, who can keep track?
ygData.messageBody:
Ah yes! I meant Kaladim. The island of Faydwer is still a mystery to
me, and the names confuse me quite often. Kaladim, Kelethin, Felwithe,
who can keep track? Anyway, the dwarf to talk to normally stands right
inside the entrance to the mine. Of course, the other day when I went
to look he was standing by the bank. Maybe he was encumbered by
tongues?
I'm sorry that I can't remember his name, but like I said, he is
usually standing just inside the mine.

Mandibal
Bard from Qeynos
Geography Wiz :)

----------

Message: 9
Date: Tue, 15 Jun 1999 11:18:44 -0400
From: Bob Stewart <bstewart@...>
Subject: Re: Level 11 Song

At 04:04 PM 6/14/99 -0700, Brian Dickens wrote:
>I was in Kelethin talking to the dwarf who you give bandit tongues to.

My wandering friend, do you mean Kaladim, since you say you spoke to a
dwarf. Would this be one of the dwarves that loiter outside the
Kaladim
bank? Perhaps you recall his name? Two of my adventuring companions
have
full collections of dwarf bandit tongues and have not found a use for
them.

Thrush
